description: NetworkLogging describes the specification used by network logging.

spec.description: Spec is the desired configuration for network logging.

cluster.description: Cluster specifies the log options for cluster-level network logging.

allow.description: Allow specifies the log action for policy-allowed connections.

delegate.description: Delegate can only be true if Log is true. Log:false, Delegate:true is invalid. If Delegate is true, logging will be controlled by the annotation of matching network policies.

log.description: Log specifies if logging is enabled or not. The default value is false.

deny.description: Deny specifies the log action for policy-denied connections.

delegate.description: Delegate can only be true if Log is true. Log:false, Delegate:true is invalid. If Delegate is true, logging will be controlled by the annotation of the pod's namespace.

log.description: Log specifies if logging is enabled or not. The default value is false.
